title.rendered: 10-DAY Anniversary Bash! + Buy 10, Get 10 + Ribbon Cutting

content.rendered:
10th Anniversary with 10 Days of Fun!

Next week we are celebrating our 10-year anniversary. The festivities kick off with a ribbon cutting on Tuesday (3/28) at 4:00 at the Warner Robins store and is followed by 9 more days of giveaways at ALL locations. PLUS, we are running a BUY 10, GET 10 sale on ALL used books at ALL Gottwals Books locations!

 

 

Special Hours on March 28th

To allow our entire staff to attend the ribbon cutting in Warner Robins, we are closing the Byron, Perry, and Macon stores at 3:00 on 3/28. The Warner Robins location will be open until 6:00. Please come and join us at the ribbon cutting. We will have refreshments and giveaways!

 

 

Nominate Gottwals Books for Best of the Best!

Nominate Gottwals Books for the “Best of the Best” award. Simply click on the link below, click “Best Bookstore,” write in Gottwals Books, and click nominate.

http://macontelegraph.secondstreetapp.com/l/2017-Best-of-the-Best-Nominations–Macon/Ballot/Shopping
